title: Not able to log into client or log into support page of league
body: My client has not been logging me in for about 5 days now. Im pretty sure it was right after the update. Every time I try it will give me one of two errors. It will either say unable to log into the login queue check if the servers are up or it will say something went wrong, try again later. I have tried just about everything. PLEASE HELP!

replies.body: I'm curious if there might be a firewall or connection setting that's blocking you from using our services.  Grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if auto-configuring your firewall settings help.  If the issue persists, contact us directly through email via support@riotgames.com.  I hope that helps!
